title: Kensa Sloshing Machine
paragraphs: The Kensa Sloshing Machine is a main weapon in Splatoon 2. It is a Toni Kensa-branded variant of the Sloshing Machine.

The Kensa Sloshing Machine shares its overall design with the Sloshing Machine. However, the Kensa Sloshing Machine is black with a white Toni Kensa logo on the side. The Toni Kensa signature red clothespin is attached to the ring of metal that sticks out from the inside part.
The Kensa Sloshing Machine was released on 3 October 2018 at 02:00 UTC. It comes with Fizzy Bombs and the Splashdown.
- An Octoling girl (second left) with the Kensa Sloshing Machine
